Title: Poltergeist
Writer: Steven Spielberg (screenplay by), Michael Grais (screenplay by), Mark Victor (screenplay by), Steven Spielberg (story by)
Actors: Craig T. Nelson, JoBeth Williams, Beatrice Straight, Dominique Dunne
Plot: A young family are visited by ghosts in their home. At first the ghosts appear friendly, moving objects around the house to the amusement of everyone, then they turn nasty and start to terrorise the family before they "kidnap" the youngest daughter.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
